thread.section_title: Ibis Paris Avenue d'Italie 13eme - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Enjoy our stay there
thread.title_full: Enjoy our stay there - Review of Ibis Paris Avenue d'Italie 13eme, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: KleinPlaneet
title: Enjoy our stay there
text:
The hotel located not so far from metro station Place d'Italie opposite shopping mall. There're many restaurant in the area and quite safe.
Room is small but Ibis style. Quiet but wall not soundproof. Shower cabin has no barrier..water may run over to toilet floor...no shower cap and small towel just big one.
Dining room is small when it crowded. Foods are not various but delicious.
Staff very friendly...service with smile
We'll return there again.
